Class AnimatedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • AnimatedImage

  • public class AnimatedImage
extends java.lang.Object
    The AnimatedImage Class This class stores an animated image, by storing the path to the location where the frames of the animation are stored. This is used in the WaterWorks program for the Splashscreen animation.

    Course Information:

    ICS4U0 with Krasteva, V.

    Total Time Spent: 5 hours

    Version:
    6 06.09.2019 
     Version History:
 May 17:
 Vansh wrote the class to store an array of Image objects and a duration variable to represent length of time that an animation lasts. He wrote a getFrame() method that returned the correct frame depending on the time and the duration of the animation. -- 1.5 hours
 May 23:
 Vansh changed the getFrame() method to return the frame the animation was on based off of a parameter passed, and not the time. He also wrote the frame() method which returns a frame based off of the time passed by the uer. He also wrote the lastFrame() method, which returns the last frame of the animation. -- 1 hour
 May 29:
 Vansh redid the class to no longer store an array of Images, but to store a path location and a frame number. The instance methods and constructor were rewritten to accomodate for this change, and now do not return items using indexes of an array, but return items using the path location. -- 1.5 hours
 June 4:
 Vansh wrote the getSplashFrame() and splashFrame() methods to return the correct frame for the Splashscreen animation and to return the number of the frame that the Splashscreen animation is on, respectively. -- 1 hour
    Author:
    Maria Yampolsky and Vansh Juneja

      • AnimatedImage

        public AnimatedImage(java.lang.String path,
                     int nframes,
                     double duratn)
        The constructor of the AnimatedImage class, which creates an object of the class.
        Parameters:
        path - The path where the images used for the animation are located
        nframes - The number of frames in the animation
        duratn - The duration of the animation

    • Method Detail

      • frame

        public int frame(double time)
        The frame() method, which returns the number of the frame of an animation based off of the time entered.
        Parameters:
        time - The time into the animation, determines which frame the animation is on
        Returns:
        An int that represents the number of the frame that the animation is on

      • getFrame

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getFrame(double time)
        The getFrame() method, which returns the frame of an animation based off of the time entered.
        Parameters:
        time - The time into the animation, determines which frame the animation is on
        Returns:
        An Image object that represents the frame that the animation is currently on

      • getSplashFrame

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getSplashFrame(double time)
        The getSplashFrame() method, which returns the frame of an animation based off of the time entered.
        Parameters:
        time - The time into the animation, determines which frame the Splashscreen animation is on
        Returns:
        An Image object that represents the frame that the animation is currently on
